column2: ENGLISH
Rebel Anti-Christ
DEV: All qualifying vassals of my liege will support me in a revolt.
DEV: Court Faction Revolt
DEV: Prosperity Faction Revolt
DEV: Glory Faction Revolt
DEV: Tradition Faction Revolt
Start an overthrow revolt against [Root.GetTitledFirstName] led by the Court Faction, as if they had voted to do so.
Start an overthrow revolt against [Root.GetTitledFirstName] led by the Prosperity Faction, as if they had voted to do so.
Start an overthrow revolt against [Root.GetTitledFirstName] led by the Glory Faction, as if they had voted to do so.
Start an overthrow revolt against [Root.GetTitledFirstName] led by the Tradition Faction, as if they had voted to do so.
DEV: Log Civil War State
Dump [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s civil war state tracking information to game.log.
Disband my faction supporting [From.GetPossPronoun] claim on §Y[emf_claim_title.GetName]§! for at least §Y5§! years.
The loyalists will respect your wishes and stand down regarding your claim on §Y[emf_claim_title.GetName]§! for at least §Y5§! years.
Inform the claimant, §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!, before I approach my liege.

Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! I and a powerful group of loyalists are ready to present an ultimatum to the usurper, [From.Liege.GetTitledName], demanding your rule over [emf_claim_title.GetName]. Is this what you want?

Your loyal supporter,
[From.GetTitledName]
Why yes! And I shall join my army with yours.
Of course. My army already stands with yours.
Sure...
I don't want this happening on my behalf!

Most loyal [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I fully endorse serving an ultimatum to the usurper, [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]. It is time for the [Root.Liege.GetTitle] to see justice, and your part in that shall not be forgotten by many.

Good luck,
[From.GetTitledName]

Most loyal [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I fully endorse serving an ultimatum to the usurper, [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]. Indeed, I pledge my full military support to assist our common cause, should the [Root.Liege.GetTitle] refuse to see reason.

In solidarity,
[From.GetTitledName]
It's show time...

Most loyal [Root.GetTitledFirstName], while I am grateful and honored by your support, I do not wish my claim on [emf_claim_title.GetName] to be pressed at this time. Please stand down. Perhaps I will feel differently in time...

Thank you,
[From.GetTitledName]
Oof. I shall stand down then.

§RDebug Mode: PF Error§!

[From.GetTitledName]

Incoherent non-ruler civil war state!

§RDebug Mode: PF Error§!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName]

Incoherent civil war state!

You may incite a normal faction overthrow revolt, as if the faction had decided to do so, wherein dynamic call-to-arms will work as usual. Alternatively, you may force all qualifying vassals of [From.GetTitledFirstName] to accept the rebel call-to-arms, which will normally result in a much more inclusive revolt.
Standard Revolt
Maximal Revolt
§Y[Root.SupportedClaimant.GetBestName]§! has a claim on the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!
Is NOT in revolt [This.GetHerselfHimself] NOR are any of [This.GetPossPronoun] lieges in revolt
